paper_abstract: in this note we discuss the Open Grid Service Environment (OGSE). which clarifies a central aspect of [Valente, P., Mitra, G., The evolution of web-based optimisation: From ASP to e-Services, Decision Support Systems 43 (4) (2007) 1096-1116]. (C) 2009 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Discussion of "The evolution of web-based optimization: From ASP to e-Services"
